name: Anxious Heart
description: Liquid heart series: #2 Anxious Heart - A fragile glass heart filled with uncertainty and fear. Anxiety is an old friend that will try to revisit you often. It is only in our own power to recognise, separate and overcome it. Try not to treat it as your enemy but instead befriend it to help it find peace. 30 Frame looping animation drawn by NoruPixels (노루시).
